TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlTypeName extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供以名稱和命名空間指定 XAML 型別的方法。

span.span: Provides a means to specify a XAML type in terms of name and namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XAML 類型系統中，是型別資訊類別，而是多個提供不同的方式指定該類型的資料結構。 is the type information class in the XAML type system, whereas is more of a data structure that provides different ways of specifying that type. 也會提供靜態 helper 方法來產生所解析的 XAML 命名空間中現有的類型識別碼。 also provides static helper methods for generating a by resolving an existing type identifier in a XAML namespace.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Provides a value based on a string that can specify multiple type names, and an object that can resolve a markup prefix into a namespace.
The created .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是巢狀的類型名稱或多個型別名稱剖析這個方法所啟用的準 BNF:The following is quasi-BNF for the nested type name or multiple type name parsing enabled by this method: ``` NestedTypeName = Name | Name '+' NestedTypeName TypeName = NestedTypeName | NestedTypeName ‘[]’ XamlTypeName = Prefix ‘:’ TypeName TypeArgs | TypeName TypeArgs TypeArgs = empty | ‘(‘ XamlTypeNameList ‘)’ XamlTypeNameList = XamlTypeName XamlTypeNameList1 XamlTypeNameList1 = empty | ‘,’ XamlTypeNameList ```

span.span: or is .
String cannot be parsed.
